mapper.sql: SCENIC_SPOT_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT, SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE, SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL, SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, SCENIC_SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, SCENIC_SPOT_ROBOT_TOTAL, SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS, SCENIC_SPOT_OPENWORD, SCENIC_SPOT_CLOSEWORD, SCENIC_SPOT_BEYOND_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_RENT_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_RENT_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_REMAINING_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_RENT_TIME, COORDINATE_RANGE, SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT, NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE, WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE, RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME, ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS, SCENIC_SPOT_THE_SERVER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, SCENIC_SPOT_FID, SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY, SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME, TEST_START_TIME, TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME, FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME, STOP_OPERATION_TIME, COMPANY_ID, PAUSE_STATE, WORK_TIME, CLOSING_TIME, PAUSE_BROADCAST, WORK_BROADCAST, CLOSING_BROADCAST, LAMP_OPENING_TIME, LAMP_CLOSING_TIME, LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME, FREE_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_USAGE_SETTING,HEAT,COORDINATE_RANGE_BAIDU,COORDINATE_RANGE_ADIUS,SCENIC_SPOT_COMPANY, COORDINATE_RANGE_GAODE,SPOT_LABEL,TOUR_DURATION,BROADCAST_CONTENT,ADMISSION_TICKET,IF_NEED_ADMISSION_TICKET

SCENIC_SPOT_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT, SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE, SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL, SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, SCENIC_SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, SCENIC_SPOT_ROBOT_TOTAL, SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS, SCENIC_SPOT_OPENWORD, SCENIC_SPOT_CLOSEWORD, SCENIC_SPOT_BEYOND_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_RENT_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_RENT_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_REMAINING_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_RENT_TIME, COORDINATE_RANGE, SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT, NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE, WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE, RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME, ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS, SCENIC_SPOT_THE_SERVER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY, SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME, TEST_START_TIME, TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME, FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME, STOP_OPERATION_TIME, COMPANY_ID, PAUSE_STATE, WORK_TIME, CLOSING_TIME, PAUSE_BROADCAST, WORK_BROADCAST, CLOSING_BROADCAST, LAMP_OPENING_TIME, LAMP_CLOSING_TIME, LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME, FREE_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_USAGE_SETTING,HEAT,COORDINATE_RANGE_BAIDU,COORDINATE_RANGE_ADIUS,SCENIC_SPOT_COMPANY,COORDINATE_RANGE_GAODE,SPOT_LABEL,TOUR_DURATION,BROADCAST_CONTENT,ADMISSION_TICKET
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT a JOIN sys_scenic_spot_heat b ON a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = b.scenic_spot_id
AND b.type = #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND b.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_DAYS(b.update_time) = TO_DAYS(now())
LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_IMG c ON a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = c.SCENIC_SPOT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BINDING d ON a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = d.SCENIC_SPOT_FID
1=1 AND a.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS IN (1,3)
AND (d.SCENIC_SPOT_PID = #{cityId} or d.SCENIC_SPOT_SID = #{cityId})
AND a.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME like concat ('%',#{scenicSpotName},'%')
AND b.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY b.total DESC, b.create_time ASC
ORDER BY b.same_day DESC , b.create_time ASC
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_SCENIC_SPOT (SCENIC_SPOT_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT, SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE, SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL, SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, SCENIC_SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME, TEST_START_TIME, TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME, FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME, STOP_OPERATION_TIME, COMPANY_ID, PAUSE_STATE, WORK_TIME, CLOSING_TIME, PAUSE_BROADCAST, WORK_BROADCAST, CLOSING_BROADCAST, LAMP_OPENING_TIME, LAMP_CLOSING_TIME, LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME, FREE_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_USAGE_SETTING,HEAT,SCENIC_SPOT_SLOGAN, SCENIC_SPOT_COMPANY) values (#{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scenicSpotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenicSpotContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenicSpotPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenicSpotEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT
SCENIC_SPOT_NAME = #{scenicSpotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT = #{scenicSpotContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE = #{scenicSpotPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL = #{scenicSpotEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

COORDINATE_RANGE = #{coordinateRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT = #{scenicSpotDeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE = #{normalCappedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE = #{weekendCappedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME = #{randomBroadcastTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS = #{robotWakeupWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_THE_SERVER = #{scenicSpotTheServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_FID = #{scenicSpotFid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY = #{scenicSpotFrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME = #{scenicSpotFenceTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME = #{scenicSpotForbiddenZoneTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_START_TIME = #{testStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME = #{trialOperationsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME = #{formalOperationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_OPERATION_TIME = #{stopOperationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PAUSE_STATE = #{pauseState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_TIME = #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSING_TIME = #{closingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAUSE_BROADCAST = #{pauseBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_BROADCAST = #{workBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSING_BROADCAST = #{closingBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAMP_OPENING_TIME = #{lampOpeningTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAMP_CLOSING_TIME = #{lampClosingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME = #{lampLightingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREE_TIME_SETTING = #{freeTimeSetting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GIFT_TIME_SETTING = #{giftTimeSetting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GIFT_USAGE_SETTING = #{giftUsageSetting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAT = #{heat,jdbcType=BIGINT},
START_LEVEL = #{startLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_SLOGAN = #{scenicSpotSlogan,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
COORDINATE_RANGE_BAIDU = #{coordinateRangeBaiDu,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
COORDINATE_RANGE_GAODE = #{coordinateRangeGaoDe,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
COORDINATE_RANGE_ADIUS = #{coordinateRangeAdius,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
INTRODUCTION = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENIC_SPOT_COMPANY = #{scenicSpotCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIN_YING_NAME = #{pinYingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPOT_LABEL = #{spotLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOUR_DURATION = #{tourDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BROADCAST_CONTENT = #{broadcastContent,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
ADMISSION_TICKET = #{admissionTicket,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
IF_NEED_ADMISSION_TICKET = #{ifNeedAdmissionTicket,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
where SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT set SCENIC_SPOT_NAME = #{scenicSpotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT = #{scenicSpotContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE = #{scenicSpotPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coordinateRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT = #{scenicSpotDeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE = #{normalCappedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE = #{weekendCappedPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME = #{randomBroadcastTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS = #{robotWakeupWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_THE_SERVER = #{scenicSpotTheServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_FID = #{scenicSpotFid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY = #{scenicSpotFrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME = #{scenicSpotFenceTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME = #{scenicSpotForbiddenZoneTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_START_TIME = #{testStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME = #{trialOperationsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME = #{formalOperationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOP_OPERATION_TIME = #{stopOperationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PAUSE_STATE = #{pauseState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_TIME = #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOSING_TIME = #{closingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAUSE_BROADCAST = #{pauseBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_BROADCAST = #{workBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOSING_BROADCAST = #{closingBroadcast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAMP_OPENING_TIME = #{lampOpeningTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAMP_CLOSING_TIME = #{lampClosingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME = #{lampLightingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREE_TIME_SETTING = #{freeTimeSetting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GIFT_TIME_SETTING = #{giftTimeSetting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GIFT_USAGE_SETTING = #{broadcastContent,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, ADMISSION_TICKET = #{admissionTicket,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, IF_NEED_ADMISSION_TICKET = #{ifNeedAdmissionTicket,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, where SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select sss.*,sssi.SCNEIC_SPOT_IMG_URL as scenicSpotImgUrl from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BINDING sssb left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss on sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_FID = sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_IMG sssi on sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_FID = sssi.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
and 1=1
and sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_PID = #{cityId} and sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_TYPE = 0 and sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_TYPE = ''
and sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{spotName},'%')
and sss.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS = 1 and sss.SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS = 10
order by START_LEVEL DESC
order by HEAT DESC

select sss.*,sssi.SCNEIC_SPOT_IMG_URL as scenicSpotImgUrl from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BINDING sssb left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss on sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_FID = sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_IMG sssi on sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_FID = sssi.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{spotName},'%')
and sss.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS = 1 and sss.SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS = 10
order by START_LEVEL DESC
order by HEAT DESC
select sss.*,sssb.url from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss left join sys_scenic_spot_banner sssb on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = sssb.spot_id where sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{spotId} GROUP BY sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID

select sss.*,sssi.SCNEIC_SPOT_IMG_URL as scenicSpotImgUrl,ssd.title as dynamicTitle from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_IMG sssi on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = sssi.SCENIC_SPOT_ID right join (select * from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BINDING where SCENIC_SPOT_TYPE = 0 or SCENIC_SPOT_TYPE is null ) sssb on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_FID left join sys_spot_dynamic ssd on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = ssd.ascription_spot_id
sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{spotName},'%')
and sssb.SCENIC_SPOT_PID = #{fid}
and sss.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS in (1,3) and sss.SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS = 10
group by sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
order by sss.START_LEVEL DESC
order by sss.HEAT DESC

select sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID,sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME,sss.COORDINATE_RANGE,sss.COORDINATE_RANGE_BAIDU,sss.COORDINATE_RANGE_GAODE,sss.COORDINATE_RANGE_ADIUS, sss.SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS ,sss.CREATE_DATE,sss.WORK_TIME,sss.CLOSING_TIME ,sss.PIN_YING_NAME,sss.INTRODUCTION,sss.SCENIC_SPOT_SLOGAN,sss.HEAT, sss.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS,sss.START_LEVEL,sss.IF_NEED_ADMISSION_TICKET, sssi.SCNEIC_SPOT_IMG_URL as scenicSpotImgUrl,sss.TOUR_DURATION,sss.BROADCAST_CONTENT,sss.ADMISSION_TICKET,sss.SPOT_LABEL,sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, sssa.SCNEIC_SPOT_AUDIO_URL from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_IMG sssi on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = sssi.SCENIC_SPOT_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_AUDIO sssa on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = sssa.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
1=1
and sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{spotId}
and sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME like concat('%',#{spotName},'%')
and date(sss.CREATE_DATE) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(sss.UPDATE_DATE) <= date(#{endTime})
group by sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID

select sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME,sss.COORDINATE_RANGE,sss.COORDINATE_RANGE_BAIDU,sss.COORDINATE_RANGE_ADIUS ,sss.CREATE_DATE ,sss.PIN_YING_NAME,sss.INTRODUCTION,sss.SCENIC_SPOT_SLOGAN,sss.HEAT,sss.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS ,sssi.SCNEIC_SPOT_IMG_URL as scenicSpotImgUrl, sssa.SCNEIC_SPOT_AUDIO_URL,sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID,sss.SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT,sss.SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT sss left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_IMG sssi on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = sssi.SCENIC_SPOT_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_AUDIO sssa on sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = sssa.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
sss.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{spotId}
and sss.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME like concat('%',#{spotName},'%')
and date(sss.CREATE_DATE) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(sss.UPDATE_DATE) <= date(#{endTime})

SELECT a.*, c.SCNEIC_SPOT_IMG_URL as scenicSpotImgUrl FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT a LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_IMG c ON a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = c.SCENIC_SPOT_ID LEFT JOIN sys_scenic_spot_heat b ON a.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = b.scenic_spot_id
AND b.type = #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND b.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_DAYS(b.update_time) = TO_DAYS(now())
AND a.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS IN (1,3) ORDER BY b.same_day DESC, b.create_time ASC
AND a.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS IN (1,3) AND b.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY b.total DESC, b.create_time ASC
select SCENIC_SPOT_ID from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT where SCENIC_SPOT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{placeOfOwnership},'%')
select * from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT where (RECOMMENDED_SPOTS is not null and RECOMMENDED_SPOTS <> 0) order by RECOMMENDED_SPOTS DESC limit 5
